channel.title: Lambda on Unladen swallow

item.title: lambda inter s3
item.author: olivier.wulveryck@gmail.com (Olivier Wulveryck)
item.description: In this post I will explain how to setup a lambda function written in go that will be triggered when an object is dropped on a bucket on s3. The function will read the object and copy it into another bucket iin another location. It will use AWS’ golang sdk. The Lambda skeleton AWS Lambda does not support the go programming language natively. Anyway, it as a go program is compiled and packed as a simgle static binary, it it easy to execute a go program whitin a wrapper (node.
